verses.name: John 18:17
verses.text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter, Art not thou also one of this man’s disciples? He saith, I am not.

verses.name: John 18:18
verses.text: And the servants and officers stood there, who had made a fire of coals; for it was cold: and they warmed themselves: and Peter stood with them, and warmed himself.

verses.name: John 18:19
verses.text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples, and of his doctrine.

verses.name: John 18:20
verses.text: Jesus answered him, I spake openly to the world; I ever taught in the synagogue, and in the temple, whither the Jews always resort; and in secret have I said nothing.
